name: HackInsan
contribution: Secured 1st Place in the Pemuda GEMA Category and 3rd Place Overall in the HackInsan 2024 competition.
Developed PemTeach, a teacher support tool designed to enhance volunteer educators' effectiveness through cultural insights and personalized teaching methods.
Delivered the solution using Flutter and Flutterflow, enabling rapid prototyping and cross-platform functionality.
summary_contribution: Won 1st Place in Category and 3rd Overall at HackInsan 2024.
Developed PemTeach, a teacher support tool for volunteer educators.
Delivered a cross-platform solution using Flutter and Flutterflow.

name: GCPBoleh Cloud Challenge (Season 5)
contribution: Earned 10+ Google Cloud skill badges through hands-on labs, covering GCP infrastructure, Terraform, Vertex AI, and secure network design.
Gained practical experience building cloud solutions with Compute Engine and Cloud Storage.
Explored serverless development using Firebase, including authentication, Firestore, and hosting.
Analyzed NCAA® March Madness® data with BigQuery and applied basic TensorFlow models for introductory machine learning insights.
Completed structured learning paths on GCP fundamentals, data workflows, and infrastructure-as-code.
summary_contribution: Earned 10+ Google Cloud skill badges through hands-on labs.
Built cloud solutions with Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, and Firebase.
Explored data analysis and machine learning with BigQuery and TensorFlow.

name: H2O Splashmania
contribution: Planned and coordinated seamless event execution through strategic oversight and effective stakeholder communication.
Led and motivated teams to maintain collaborative dynamics and ensure high productivity throughout event operations.
Actively contributed to decision-making and demonstrated adaptability in managing on-site challenges.
summary_contribution: Coordinated event execution and stakeholder communication.
Led teams to maintain collaboration and productivity.
Adapted to on-site challenges and supported decision-making.

name: Lazada ASBX Business Challenge
contribution: Proposed 'Seller+', an integration of tools to empower Lazada sellers through features like a chatbot, editing tools, data visualization, and a gamified loyalty program.
Analyzed complex problems using Design Thinking principles and proposed creative, innovative solutions based on feasibility assessments.
Applied relevant tools and techniques to evaluate potential solutions, ensuring alignment with real-world industry challenges in eCommerce, omnichannel ecosystems, and marketing.
Delivered clear and persuasive oral presentations, showcasing effective communication and problem-solving skills.
Collaborated actively within teams, demonstrating resilience, adaptability, and strong teamwork throughout the project.
summary_contribution: Proposed 'Seller+', a toolkit for Lazada sellers with chatbot, editing, and analytics features.
Applied Design Thinking to analyze problems and develop feasible solutions.
Collaborated in teams and delivered clear, persuasive presentations.
